verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:10
verses.text: For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:11
verses.text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly, working not at all, but are busybodies.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:12
verses.text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:13
verses.text: But ye, brethren, be not weary in well doing.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:14
verses.text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle, note that man, and have no company with him, that he may be ashamed.
